roleset.name: to affirm or assert again

example.name: transitive
example.text: While he reaffirmed support for the country 's Feb. 25 elections , Ortega indicated that renewed U.S. military aid to the Contras could thwart the balloting .
example.arg: support for the country 's Feb. 25 elections

example.name: another transitive
example.text: In [*-1] reaffirming the current monetary policy of using high interest rates to fight inflation and shore up the pound , [Mr. Lawson]-1 dismissed other approaches to managing the economy .
example.arg: the current monetary policy of using high interest rates to fight inflation and shore up the pound
